warnings: For external use only Do not use when Your scalp is red, inflamed, irritated or painful When using this product Do not apply on other parts of the body Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse eyes thoroughly with water. Do not apply directly to wound or open cut. Stop use and ask doctor if rash or irritation on scalp develops and lasts. Store at room temperature
dosage_administration: Put solution into powder and mix. Shake well and apply on skin to absorb.
indications: Makes the skin smooth and healthy-looking by working wonders on skin. Reduces appearance of wrinkles, scars and large pores.
